allInclusive.title: All Inclusive
allInclusive.description: Another Poker Planning is a free and ad-free tool. No account to create, no limit on participants, no hidden fees. Everything is designed to give you the best experience.

HomePage.description: is a straightforward tool designed to enhance teamwork, improve accuracy, and bring clarity to your estimation sessions, all in one place.

estimationMethods.title: Estimation Methods
estimationMethods.description: With Another Poker Planning, estimate the complexity of a task using a multi-level scale. An approach designed to gather the team‚Äôs input and achieve a clear and precise consensus.

simplifiedVoting.title: Simplified Voting
simplifiedVoting.description: Discover a smooth and intuitive experience for your poker planning sessions. Choose your estimate with a single click‚Äîsimple and straightforward. Voting has never been so natural.

result.title: Result
result.description: Instantly view the team‚Äôs votes with a clear and elegant display. Each estimate is highlighted to facilitate discussion and quickly reach a consensus.

securityAndEphemerality.title: Security and Ephemerality
securityAndEphemerality.description: Your data, your peace of mind. No information is saved; everything happens in real time. Once the vote is complete, the room self-destructs after a few hours. Because your discussions should remain as ephemeral as your decisions.

about.title: üéâ A dream come true! üéâ
about.intro_1: Have you ever used Planning Poker tools and felt frustrated? Limitations here, lack of customization there, or simply an experience that lacks fluidity?
about.intro_2: That's exactly what happened to me.
about.intro_3_prefix: üëâ I wanted a simple, fast, fun tool, but above all
about.features_title: üí° Another Planning Poker is much more than just a Planning Poker tool:
about.feature_1: to create and manage your sessions in just a few clicks.
about.feature_2: and a clear visualization of votes.
about.feature_3: : Fibonacci, T-Shirt sizing, or even the ability to create your own custom cards. Want to vote with emojis ü¶ñü¶ÜüöÄ or weather ‚òÄÔ∏è? It‚Äôs possible! üòÅ
about.feature_4_prefix: nothing is stored! Everything works in
about.feature_4_middle: , and as soon as everyone leaves the session,
about.feature_5: , even in terms of colors to brighten up your sessions (small Easter Egg included üëÄ).
about.feature_6: : available in French, English, Spanish, and Italian, perfect for international or remote teams. üåç
about.feature_7_bold: And most importantly, 100% free and ad-free
about.planning_poker_title: But what exactly is Planning Poker?
about.planning_poker_desc: It's a great tool for agile teams: it helps quickly estimate the complexity or time required to complete a task while fostering discussion and alignment among team members.
about.why_desc_prefix: Because I believe a tool should simplify life, not complicate it. Too often, I was held back by existing solutions that weren‚Äôt flexible, engaging, or secure enough. I wanted to solve these problems once and for all and offer teams a tool that boosts their productivity
about.conclusion_title: üöÄ The result is here, and I am proud to share this journey with you!
about.conclusion_desc: Whether you're a product owner, developer, or scrum master, I invite you to try it for your next Planning Poker session.
